rows.label: qst104708_msg001
rows.name:
あなた方のおかげで助かりました これからイヤサキ港に救援要請に行きますが
一緒に来てくれませんか(仮)

rows.label: qst104708_msg0001
rows.name: Ugh...my head...

rows.label: qst104708_msg0002
rows.name: Is everyone all right?

rows.label: qst104708_msg0003
rows.name:
Of course. My friends are
not to be trifled with.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0004
rows.name: Right then, how shall we proceed?

rows.label: qst104708_msg0051
rows.name:
There must be a wise
proverb that fits...

rows.label: qst104708_msg0052
rows.name: "Yesterday's foe can be today's friend"

rows.label: qst104708_msg0053
rows.name: "He who does not work, shall not eat"

rows.label: qst104708_msg0101
rows.name:
One only has to look at our
party to see the truth of that.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0102
rows.name:
Rex-san is from Liberalitas.
Tora is a Nopon. Zeke-san
here hails from Luxuria.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0103
rows.name:
And of course... Meleph-san is an
Superbian, and my Lady Nia is Gulan.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0104
rows.name:
They were formerly bitter foes but
now are the fastest of friends.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0105
rows.name:
This is all very stirring, boyo,
but you lot are you lot. We're-

rows.label: qst104708_msg0106
rows.name:
Mummy, let's go home. He
doesn't want us here.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0107
rows.name: Tucha...

rows.label: qst104708_msg0108
rows.name:
Don't be mean to them,
Da. They look sad.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0109
rows.name:
You came from far away, right?
Would you like to try a Meaty
Carrot? I growed them myself!

rows.label: qst104708_msg0110
rows.name: Really? Thanks!

rows.label: qst104708_msg0111
rows.name: Lavi, girl...

rows.label: qst104708_msg0112
rows.name:
Leave it to children to demonstrate
the flexibility that adults lack.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0113
rows.name:
Someday, these children
will have no home.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0114
rows.name:
I'm fair sorry. I didn't think
about how terrible it must be
to leave your home like that.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0115
rows.name:
Me too. I forgot that we've been
eating your food for years.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0116
rows.name: Perhaps now we can move forward?

rows.label: qst104708_msg0201
rows.name:
That's right! These people
didn't come here to leech
off the Gulan people.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0202
rows.name:
You must band together and forge a
new life in whatever way you can.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0203
rows.name:
I cannot hold a sword, nor
can I administer first aid
to injured comrades.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0204
rows.name:
But I am content to lend my lady Nia
- my Driver - any strength I can.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0205
rows.name:
...Cat's got a point. So,
here's what I'm thinking.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0206
rows.name:
It was tricky to get anything to
grow in the soil back home...

rows.label: qst104708_msg0207
rows.name:
But I worked as a researcher trying
to squeeze as much growth out of our
wee plants as we possibly could.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0208
rows.name:
I'm pretty sure that if we applied my
research to the fertile soil you have
here, we'd get amazing results.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0209
rows.name:
Listen boyo, we don't need your fancy
Empire technology. We do just-

rows.label: qst104708_msg0210
rows.name:
Hey, I'm growing Meaty
Carrots in my own garden!

rows.label: qst104708_msg0211
rows.name:
I wanna make them more
tasty. Do you know how?

rows.label: qst104708_msg0212
rows.name: Of course, little one!

rows.label: qst104708_msg0213
rows.name:
Woo hoo! Hey, Da, can
we let them help us?

rows.label: qst104708_msg0214
rows.name: Lavi, girl...

rows.label: qst104708_msg0215
rows.name:
Leave it to children to demonstrate
the flexibility that adults lack.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0216
rows.name:
Hmm... Fair do. We're all on
the same page here. Let's get
these talks back on track.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0217
rows.name:
I'm really sorry if I offended
you. These are trying times.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0218
rows.name:
Please let us help you however
we can to make up for it.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0219
rows.name:
I'm feeling good about how
things are working out.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0220
rows.name: Perhaps now we can move forward.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0301
rows.name:
Thank you, everyone.
Especially you, Byakko.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0302
rows.name:
Enju told me about everything you
did. I'm super grateful to you all.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0303
rows.name:
I need to work hard until I'm a
Driver who doesn't worry their
Blade quite as much as I do.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0320
rows.name:
Hey, Orca... You know, it would
be perfectly fine if you wanted
to ride on my back on occasion.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0321
rows.name: R-really? I'm pretty heavy, you know.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0322
rows.name:
Don't worry about it! I'm
a Blade. Strength is one
thing I have going for me.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0331
rows.name:
Hey, Orca... You know, if
you ever feel sad, you're
welcome to cuddle up to me.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0332
rows.name:
Th-thank you, Enju... I'm sorry I'm
such a miserable Driver. I wish I was
better at fighting and whatnot.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0333
rows.name:
Don't worry about it! You
have a good heart, Orca, and
that's what really matters.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0351
rows.name:
Our work is done here.
We must depart soon.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0352
rows.name: I am honored to have met you, Enju.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0353
rows.name:
And I you, Byakko. You have given me
confidence I did not feel before.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0354
rows.name:
If I had not met you, I would no
doubt have gone through life never
really liking my own form.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0355
rows.name:
You helped me, in turn, to see
the benefits of this appearance.

rows.label: qst104708_msg0356
rows.name: Wonderful! Thank you, Byakko. Truly.
